item.title: New Years 2015
item.description: ##01:25 Saturday 03 January 2015 JST## It was my first time to go to a temple for New Years in Japan. It wasn’t as crowded as I expected, though there was a pretty long line of people queued up to pray(?). There was a bit of a mob near the bell that emanated some great reverberations each time a group went up to ring it. I was like, “I wanna ring it!
